Scrambled Eggs with Tomato and Green Onion
1. Crack the eggs into a bowl, season them with a little salt and pepper.
2. Beat the eggs with a fork for a minute or two.
3. Heat up a tablespoon of butter in a frying pan over medium heat.
4. Once the butter is melted, add the sliced green onion.
5. Add the diced tomato once you feel the scent of the frying green onions.
6. Cook the tomato and green onion for a couple of minutes, then add the eggs.
7. Let the eggs sit for a few seconds, then use a spatula to gently lift the cooked eggs. Repeat this procedure until the eggs are cooked.
8. Serve hot.
